scripts.DISABLEDprebuild: test "$CI" = true && npx pnpm install -r --store=node_modules/.pnpm-store || echo skipping pnpm install
scripts.postinstall: echo RUN postinstall && svelte-kit sync && ts-node-esm scripts/assets-clean.ts
scripts.svelte:prebuild: echo RUN svelte:prebuild && rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && svelte-kit sync && ts-node-esm scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.svelte:prebuildOLD: echo RUN svelte:prebuild                                       && svelte-kit sync && ts-node-esm scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.svelte:predev: echo RUN svelte:predev   && rimraf dev-dist                    && svelte-kit sync && ts-node-esm scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.svelte:dev: echo RUN svelte:dev                                    && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* vite dev --port 3000
scripts.svelte:dev-claims: echo RUN svelte:dev-claims                             && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                 CLAIMS=true vite dev --port 3000
scripts.svelte:dev-destroy: echo RUN svelte:dev-destroy                            && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true             vite dev --port 3000
scripts.svelte:dev-claims-destroy: echo RUN svelte:dev-claims-destroy                     && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true vite dev --port 3000
scripts.svelte:build: echo RUN svelte:build                                   && pnpm svelte:build:basePWA && cap sync android && cap sync ios
scripts.svelte:build:base: echo RUN svelte:build:base                              && pnpm svelte:prebuild   && vite build
scripts.svelte:build:basePWA: echo RUN svelte:build:basePWA                           && pnpm svelte:prebuild   && vite build
scripts.svelte:build:basePWAOLD: echo RUN svelte:build:basePWA                           && pnpm svelte:prebuild   && vite build && node ./pwa.js
scripts.svelte:build:netlify: echo RUN svelte:build:netlify                           && cross-env NETLIFY=true pnpm svelte:build:only-sw
scripts.svelte:build:vercel: echo RUN svelte:build:vercel                            && cross-env VERCEL=true  pnpm svelte:build:only-sw
scripts.svelte:build:only: echo RUN svelte:build:only                              && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                                                     pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-reloadsw: echo RUN svelte:build:only-reloadsw                     && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                                     RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-claims: echo RUN svelte:build:only-claims                       && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                         CLAIMS=true                 pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims: echo RUN svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims              && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*                         CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-destroy                      && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true                             pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-reloadsw-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-reloadsw-destroy             && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-claims-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-claims-destroy               && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true                 pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims-destro: echo RUN svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims-destroy      && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:*         SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw                           && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                                             pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw                  && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-claims: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-claims                    && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                 CLAIMS=true                 pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw           && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true                 CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-destroy                   && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true                             pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy          && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true             RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-claims-destroy: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-claims-destroy            && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true                 pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-des: echo RUN svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy   && cross-env BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true  pnpm svelte:build:basePWA
scripts.svelte:build:only:all: echo RUN svelte:build:all                               && pnpm svelte:build:only && pnpm svelte:build:only-reloadsw && pnpm svelte:build:only-claims && pnpm svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims && pnpm svelte:build:only-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-reloadsw-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-claims-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-reloadsw-claims-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-claims && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-claims-reloadsw && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-claims-destroy && pnpm svelte:build:only-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy
scripts.format: echo RUN format && pnpm lint:css --fix && prettier --plugin-search-dir . --write .
scripts.storybook: echo RUN storybook(:dev) && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider start-storybook -p 6006
scripts.storybook:build: echo RUN storybook:build && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider build-storybook
scripts.all: pnpm i && pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm tauri info && pnpm svelte:build && pnpm build && pnpm storybook:build && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test && pnpm check
